alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 2:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Itawamba and northeastern Monroe Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Salem, or 11 miles southeast of Fulton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremont, New Salem, Cadamy, Cardsville, Turon and Tilden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
